name: Polite Jokes / 冷笑话大全
description:
Polite Jokes / 冷笑话大全

给我的朋友雨儿生日快乐的解谜RPG。

Chinese, English in development, may contain Offensive content, any content does not represent the author's opinion.  / 目前仅支持中文，可能含有敏感内容，任何内容不代表作者本人观点。

Although starting with a school scene, you may experience a weird trip where you turn yourself into a machine, and that isn't the point. In future versions, you may meet more non-human NPCs, and try becoming water or other stranger stuff. / 虽然一开始的场景是学校，但能够体验从人变成机器了，但重点并不在此的奇怪旅行。在预期的完整版中，还将出现更多非人类NPC，以及从机器变成水了，乃至再变成什么其他东西的体验。

The prototype experience will be approximately 10 mins, I guess. There is so far one major puzzle, and 11 NPCs you can interact with, including 1 elevator. / 试玩版大致游玩时间为10分钟，大致。至此只有一个主要谜题，同时有十一名NPC可以交互，包括一名电梯。

Special Thanks: / 特别感谢：

Testers HY, Qianyuan, and Chlorine.  / 测试人员珩楹，浅缘，以及Chlorine。

My encouragement Niar. /我做游戏的动力雨儿。
